issue.title: [R] Implement common date and time functions for dplyr
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12844](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12844). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement popular date and time functions from base R, lubridate, hms, clock, etc. Include `as*()` conversion functions and `is*()` type checking functions

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12844?focusedCommentId=17400417) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
`[~icook]` can you enumerate what's missing here? I think a lot of these are done now.
